body:
spartan vi @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=95322&sid=ef6347e1478024edb4827ea10688a89d#p95322 Order of Yawgmoth equipped with Umezawa's Jitte
dealt combat damage to me forcing me to discard a card and placed a charge of Umezawa's Jitte, then after combat was resolved I was forced to discard another card and another charge was placed on Umezawa's Jitte. Both of these effects should only have occurred once. AI used the BW Fallen Knights deck.

Looking at the play-by-play, the AI didn't play any other card that would explain this effect.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Order of Yawgmoth equipped with Umezawa's Jitte causes two discards

comments.body: Looks like double strike to me - Kinsbaile Cavalier on the battlefield?
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on August 09, 2012 11:13:38_

spartan vi @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=95322&sid=ef6347e1478024edb4827ea10688a89d#p95322 Order of Yawgmoth equipped with Umezawa's Jitte
dealt combat damage to me forcing me to discard a card and placed a charge of Umezawa's Jitte, then after combat was resolved I was forced to discard another card and another charge was placed on Umezawa's Jitte. Both of these effects should only have occurred once. AI used the BW Fallen Knights deck.

Looking at the play-by-play, the AI didn't play any other card that would explain this effect.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=271_
